title: RFL PMLA case: ED attaches Rs 124-cr worth assets
description: Enforcement Directorate attached Rs 124 crore assets in money laundering probe on Religare Finvest Limited, including properties in Gurugram and Delhi. Investigation involves inflated land value, corporate loan fraud, and foreign properties like AXA China Insurance Company.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
